summary.para: Creates a color context from a DXGI color space type. It is only valid to use this with the Color Management Effect in 'Best' mode.

param.name: colorSpace
param.para: The color space to create the color context from.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Creates a color context from a simple color profile. It is only valid to use this with the Color Management Effect in 'Best' mode.

param.name: simpleProfile
param.para: The simple color profile to create the color context from.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Creates a color context from a simple color profile. It is only valid to use this with the Color Management Effect in 'Best' mode.

param.name: simpleProfile
param.para: The simple color profile to create the color context from.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Creates an SVG document from a stream.

param.name: inputXmlStream
param.para: An input stream containing the SVG XML document. If null, an empty document is created.

param.name: viewportSize
param.para: Size of the initial viewport of the document.

param.name: svgDocument
param.para: When this method returns, contains a pointer to the created SVG document.

returns.para: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: This interface performs all the same functions as the interface, plus it enables the creation of color contexts and Svg documents.
